NATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF EDUCATIONAL BROADCASTERS
OFFICE OF THE PRESIDENT
Station KUOM
University of Minnesota
Minneapolis 14, Minnesota
March 24, 1958
Mr. Sam L. Becker
Television Center
State University of Iowa
Iowa City, Iowa
Dear Sam:
Congratulations! I am delighted to learn
that you received the grant from the Fund for Adult
Education.
Your study plans sound very interesting. I
quite agree with you, we ‘'operators” need time in
which to stop and think. That was one of the reasons
I took a year off to get my Ph. D. in 1948-49. Now
I feel the need to stop and think again, especially
after trying to keep up with the affairs of both
NAEB and the University of Minnesota for the last
year and a quarter!
I will discuss with Harry the matter of the
chairmanship of the Research Committee and will get
in touch with you in due course.
Yours sincerely.
Burton Paulu
President
BPsds
cc: Harry Skornia
